heroSection.title: Explore Profiles and Locations Visually
heroSection.subtitle: Navigate through a list of profiles and interactively explore their addresses on a map for intuitive geographic visualization.

steps.title: Browse Profiles
steps.description: Easily navigate through a list of available profiles.

steps.title: View Details
steps.description: Click on a profile to see detailed information.

steps.title: Explore on Map
steps.description: See the profile's address visualized interactively on a map.

aboutSection.title: About ProfileMapper
aboutSection.description: ProfileMapper is a web application designed to help you connect with individuals by visualizing their geographic locations. Browse through a list of user profiles and explore their addresses directly on an interactive map powered by OpenStreetMap. Our goal is to provide a simple yet powerful way to understand the spatial distribution of our community.

features.title: Interactive Map Display
features.description: Visualize profile addresses directly on a dynamic map.

features.title: Profile List Navigation
features.description: Easily browse and select profiles from a clear list view.

features.title: Search & Filtering
features.description: Quickly find profiles using basic search and filtering options.

features.title: Advanced Filtering
features.description: Refine your search with advanced filters like tags, categories, or proximity.

features.title: Responsive Design
features.description: Access and explore profiles seamlessly on any device.

features.title: Data Security
features.description: Your profile data is handled with privacy and security in mind.

testimonials.name: Rohan Sharma
testimonials.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
testimonials.quote: ProfileMapper's geographic visualization is a game-changer for our campaign planning. It helps us understand our audience distribution across India perfectly.

testimonials.name: Vikram Singh
testimonials.title: Supply Chain Manager
testimonials.quote: We use ProfileMapper to get a quick overview of our vendor locations. It's simple, effective, and saves us a lot of time in logistical planning.

testimonials.name: Anushka Choudhary
testimonials.title: Community Organizer
testimonials.quote: This tool has been invaluable for mapping our volunteer network and outreach areas. ProfileMapper makes it easy to connect with people on the ground.
